body.p: IAS 16 allows an entity to choose either the cost model or the revaluation model for measuring its property, plant and equipment, on a class‑by‑class basis. The IFRIC’s view is that the measurement model that an entity chooses under IAS 16 would not be affected by the Interpretation.
